item.title: Have You Seen My Segoe?
item.dc:creator: Kevin Ragsdale
item.description:
My "Segoe UI" font is missing from the FontName dropdown in the Properties window when running Visual FoxPro in Windows 8. Anyone else seen this?

The post Have You Seen My Segoe? appeared first on Kevin Ragsdale.

item.title: One Ugly App… LIVE!!!
item.dc:creator: Kevin Ragsdale
item.description:
There's only about 100 people in the world that have seen my ugly app in-person, so I decided to do a screencast to show it off.

The post One Ugly App… LIVE!!! appeared first on Kevin Ragsdale.

item.title: Flicker-Free Web Pages (no javascript required)
item.dc:creator: Kevin Ragsdale
item.description:
I’ve spent the last few weeks playing with ASP.NET 2.0, and I’ve enjoyed using the AutoPostBack feature of the various server controls. But one thing that drives me nuts is flickering web pages from the aforementioned AutoPostBack-enabled server controls, especially in the “Web 2.0 – Everything Is AJAX And If It’s Not It’s Just Crap” […]

The post Flicker-Free Web Pages (no javascript required) appeared first on Kevin Ragsdale.

item.title: Screencast: Desktop Alert Callbacks
item.dc:creator: Kevin Ragsdale
item.description:
I’ve posted a new screencast (10 minutes, 48 seconds) which delves a little deeper into the callback functionality of the Desktop Alerts system. It starts with a demo of the Desktop Alerts from Microsoft Excel, then looks at the code behind the spreadsheet, then digs a bit deeper into the SetCallback() method of the Alert class. I […]

The post Screencast: Desktop Alert Callbacks appeared first on Kevin Ragsdale.
